home.title: UNITE Public Procurement Platform
home.whatItDoes: Creating a world where governments and companies innovate together to overcome crisis
home.mottoTwo: We are driving the new normal!
home.captchaProtection: This website is protected by Google reCaptcha V2.
home.whatWeDo: Creating a world where governments and companies innovate together to overcome crisis
home.bigTitle: UNITE - Underserved Needs in Times of Emergency - Home Page

about.first_paragraph:
UNITE is a Public Procurement Platform exclusively for governmental procurement of special orders of products and services for crisis response. 
We call it "The Alibaba of urgent public procurement requests."

 UNITE is a two-sided platform, connecting public buyers with companies that have the capability and capacity to refocus their activities to supplying goods and services in response to the COVID-19 crisis.

 Companies are invited to register on the platform, describing their capability and capacity to manufacture urgently needed products or to supply in-demand services. 
Companies can also browse and respond to open tender requests placed by public buyers. 

  Public buyers can access the platform and create a procurement request. Our software matches the procurement request with potential suppliers and facilitates the complete transaction - including initial contact, negotiation. order placement, delivery acceptance, and payment.
about.second_paragraph: UNITE differentiates itself from other solutions in that it provides a database of companies with capability to refocus operations and in that it automates the process. Other solutions include using existing suppliers and ERP/purchasing system (not suited to abnormal requirements); engagement with the market through contacting individual companies by email, telephone or in person (which is slow); use of other online sales platforms (no visibility of the ability of companies to refocus operations); own knowledge of public buyers and their connections to industry (not widely shared - limited to individuals or local teams).

bannedUsers.banTitle: Ban UNITE User Account - Admin Reserved - Please fill in the required (*) fields:
bannedUsers.banConfirmation:
You are about to ban this User from using UNITE. This can be time-limited.
Banning a UNITE User is a serious event, it should be motivated and the User notified about the reason. Please provide accurate information about it.
bannedUsers.title: UNITE - Delete User Account - Admin

bidsCatalog.title: FULL LIST OF BUYER BID REQUESTS - UNITE
bidsCatalog.listDescription: This is the whole list of bid requests (Tender Requests) that have been placed by all our UNITE Buyers by now. It includes bids of any status (valid, expired, cancelled), and also their prices, given in supplier's agreed currency.
bidsCatalog.conversionNotice: We may also convert each bid's price to the default currency of the Bid Request. We assume that suppliers may use different national currencies from those of the buyers, so then we apply conversion rates.
bidsCatalog.bidsTable: Full table of our UNITE Bid Requests from Buyers

deleteUser.title: UNITE - Delete User Account - Admin
deleteUser.confirmation:
You are about to remove all this User data from UNITE. This cannot be undone.
Deleting a UNITE User is a serious issue and it needs a well-elaborated reason. Please proceed only if you are really sure about it.
deleteUser.secondTitle: Delete User Account - Please fill in the required (*) fields

fileList.title: UNITE - FULL LIST OF UPLOADED FILES
fileList.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is a Demo list of files that are uploaded to our App folders.
fileList.description:
We include Avatars and user-specific files that are uploaded. For practical reasons, we prefer uploading files to dedicated folders of the application hosting space, and not to the DB itself - currently the database only contains a few uploaded files.
Note: Only Site Administrators can access these lists. So, guys, what we get to see here - it is only for us!
fileList.productImages: List of UNITE Product Image Files
fileList.noProductImages: Sorry, no Product Image files here.
fileList.noUploadedDocuments: Sorry, no uploaded Documents are here.

memberList.title: UNITE - FULL LIST OF MEMBERS - Buyers, Supervisors, Suppliers
memberList.description_partOne: Disclaimer: This is a Demo list of members. At this moment they do not represent real economic entities from the world. Any resemblance to any real-life company is unintentional. This list is shown only for Development purposes, and it is only accessible to Administrators.
memberList.description_partTwo: However, in the coming future UNITE will have real members that will be listed. We will limit the amount of specific data to be made publicly available on our platform, according to the GDPR laws and rules. We may also restrict the access of external visitors to data about our members, meaning that you have to join UNITE (remember: business-to-business) to see the said information.

viewFeedbacks.title: UNITE - View Platform Feedbacks
viewFeedbacks.description: Below we have our Feedbacks, Suggestions, and other Inquiries from our Users.

deactivate.title: UNITE - Deactivate Buyer Account
deactivate.legend: Deactivate Buyer Account - Please fill in the required (*) fields
deactivate.name: Organization name
deactivate.confirm:
Are you sure you want to deactivate your Buyer account?
This will remove your placed Bid Requests in UNITE. You will be automatically reactivated at the next login.
We hope to see you back soon!
deactivate.notice: If you temporarily deactivate your Buyer Account, your placed Bids (Orders) have to be cancelled. Corresponding Suppliers will be notified upon bid cancellation. When you activate your account again at login, you will have to place your orders again if you want to do so.

index.title: Buyer Dashboard - UNITE
index.ability: You can open and send Bid (Tender) Requests to your preferred Suppliers.
index.bidsCount: You have made a total of { bidsLength } bids, their overall price (expressed in your currency) is {price} {currency} .
index.noBids: You have placed no bids for this Supplier so far.
index.searchSuppliers: Suppliers with the requested capabilities will be searched for.
index.multiSupplier: You can select multiple suppliers for your bid request. Please refer to the drop-down below.

placeBid.title: Buyer - Place Bid Request - UNITE
placeBid.info:
You can place a bid request on one or more products, belonging to one or more suppliers.
If you choose more suppliers, separate Bid Request objects will be created upon submit, with each one of them being sent to the corresponding supplier.
If you choose the same product name from several suppliers, and bids are accepted, you will have to pay each supplier. Please handle these choices carefully.
placeBid.requirement: Please fill in all the required (*) fields.
placeBid.multiSupplierInfo:
This Bid Request is directed to multiple suppliers.
For this, when submitting the bid, separate bids will be created for each Supplier and the corresponding products, with the prices accordingly converted to the matching currencies.
placeBid.bidProductPricesCurrency: The product prices are expressed in your currency.
placeBid.bidPaymentNotice:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: UNITE currently uses the Stripe Payment Gateway in TEST MODE.
No real charges are done on you. You must use a fictitious card number like 4242 4242 4242 4242, and also to invent the CCV and the expiry date.
Do you want to proceed?
placeBid.bidFundsError: Your current balance is not enough for completing this purchase. Please add some more funds to your account.
placeBid.bidUpdateNoBuyerMentions: Are you sure you want to update Bid Status without any mentions for the Buyer
placeBid.bidUpdateNoSupplierMentions: Are you sure you want to update Bid Status without any mentions for the Supplier
placeBid.bidAcceptConfirm: Are you sure you want to accept this Bid from
placeBid.bidStatusRequested: Buyer requested a bid from Supplier. Please send further information to Buyer.
placeBid.bidStatusWaiting: Waiting for Buyer to process the order information.
placeBid.bidStatusWanted: Buyer wants to buy the product for the total price of {$1} {$2}. Please Cancel or Accept.
placeBid.bidStatusStarted: Supplier started the delivery. Please wait for confirmation of buyer.
placeBid.bidStatusPaidDone: Payment and delivery have been successfully made.
placeBid.selectProducts: You can select products from the drop-down
placeBid.proposedPrice: Proposed price (it may change upon supplier's decision)
placeBid.requestNewProducts: You can request products currently not in Supplier's stock.
placeBid.productsCount: You have a number of {} products.
placeBid.suppliersPriceProduct: Supplier's price for the selected product
placeBid.multiSupplierPriceNotice: This Bid is intended to be sent to multiple suppliers. The equivalent Supplier prices will be decided separately for each one of them.
placeBid.multiSupplierPriceAdapted:
As your Bid is intended to address multiple suppliers, each one of them will have the prices of the corresponding / proposed Products converted from your currency to theirs corresponding one.
As you add amounts for products, each one of the Suppliers will have here their updated, corresponding price in their currency.
placeBid.productSuggestionTitle: People who bought this product also liked...

profile.title: Buyer Profile - UNITE
profile.terminationText:
Are you sure you want to delete your Buyer account?
This will also remove your Bid Requests and the messages you sent in UNITE.
If you just want to take a break, you may deactivate your account instead.
profile.description: This is your profile page. Please keep your data accurate, and you will have good luck with finding your needed suppliers!

viewBid.title: UNITE - Buyer - View Bid Request Details
viewBid.bidExpirationNoticeNotExtended:
This Bid Request is about to expire. Its limit date is ${0}. 
Please upload a Bid Extension Letter in order to gain ${1} more validity days.
viewBid.bidExpirationNoticeExtended:
This Bid Request is about to expire. Its limit date is ${0}.
You have already extended the initial bid validity, so the date above is final.

viewBids.title: Bid Requests List - Buyer - UNITE
viewBids.confirmRemoval: Are you sure you want to remove this Bid from your Buyer Dashboard forever?
viewBids.totalValidBids: You currently have placed a number of {$0} valid bids. Their total price is {$1} {$2}.
viewBids.cancelledBids: The following ${0} bids are Bid Requests that were cancelled. We advise you to delete them. Their total price is {$1} {$2}.
viewBids.cancellationNoticeBuyer: The {$0} bid was cancelled upon Buyer's decision. You can remove the bid completely.
viewBids.cancellationNoticeSupplier: The {$0} bid was cancelled upon Supplier's decision. You can remove the bid completely.
viewBids.expiredBids: The following ${0} bids are Bid Requests that have expired. We advise you to delete them. Their total price is {$1} {$2}.
viewBids.expiredBidsNotice: The ${0} request expired, its limit date was ${1}. You can remove the bid request completely.
viewBids.noBids: You have not placed any bids to this supplier. If you prefer, you may do so at any time.
viewBids.totalBids: You placed a total of ${0} bid requests to this supplier. Their total price is {$1} {$2}.

deactivate.title: UNITE - Deactivate Supervisor Account
deactivate.legend: Deactivate Supervisor Account - Please fill in the required (*) fields
deactivate.name: Organization name
deactivate.confirm:
Are you sure you want to deactivate your Supervisor account?
You must make sure that you have no active Buyers associated on UNITE.
You will be automatically reactivated at the next login.
We hope to see you back soon!
deactivate.notice: If you choose to temporarily deactivate your Supervisor Account, please make sure you have no active Buyers on UNITE. It is not recommended to leave your corresponding Buyers without any surveillance/supervising upon them. Doing so may encourage them to engage in unlawful activities, so please consider making this decision very carefully.
